title: What is the car on the cover of Beck's 'Uneventful Days'? - Quora

response.answer_text: I narrowed it down to a 1985–90 Honda CRX or Civic Si, but there are still some slight differences. The fuel door is on the passenger side, the headlights are different, the bonnet is different, it for some reason has Mercedes rims, but it’s obviously not a Mercedes. Also, most of the 80s CRXs had thick black side skirts and a black bumper with two orange reflective thingys on the front bumper, something that the car on the cover doesn’t have. Also, the logo on Beck’s car isn’t a Honda.
Easy, Toyota Corolla. It’s not the one everybody is used to, they’re known as AE86’s, it’s front engine rear wheel drive corolla, made from ‘84–87. They’re popular in the drift crowd.
